tool.name: Process Transient Data
tool.description: Step2 of SimStitch. Processes transient data
tool.command: matlab -logfile '${log}' -r "cd('../../../../tools/SimStitch'); try; ProcessTransients('${fileList}', '${html_input}', '${html_input.extra_files_path}', '${output_html}', '${output_html.files_path}'); catch; end; exit;"

param.name: fileList
param.label: List of files (.xml) produced by File List manager

data.name: output_html
data.label: Process Transient Data on $html_input.hid: list of output files (.html)

tool.help: Process Transients is the second step in SimStitch. It does not require any parameters and takes the output from SumTransients.
